message.body: Hey girl, just checkin on ya!!! How's everythin goin wit ur dad?

Thanks, miss. He's not good, still don't know what's wrong and he's not responding to any medicine. Going to do a colonoscopy today. It's stressing me to be out to be gone from work but I feel like I should be here.
Yea u should b there of course!!! Don't feel stressed out
